alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:41PM CDT until May 11 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CHICOT AND NORTHEASTERN ASHLEY COUNTIES... At 140 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Portland, or 13 miles east of Hamburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Portland around 145 PM CDT. Montrose around 155 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
